content: This article **needs additional citations for verification**. Please help improve this article by adding citations to reliable sources. Unsourced material may be challenged and removed. *Find sources:* "Fourth Lee Kuan Yew Cabinet" – news **·** newspapers **·** books **·** scholar **·** JSTOR *(January 2021)* *(Learn how and when to remove this message)* The **Fourth Lee Kuan Yew Cabinet** is the fourth [Cabinet of Singapore](/wiki/Cabinet_of_Singapore) formed by Prime Minister [Lee Kuan Yew](/wiki/Lee_Kuan_Yew). It was formed in 1972 after the [1972 Singaporean general election](/wiki/1972_Singaporean_general_election). The cabinet lasted from 1972 to 1976, with one shuffle in 1975. ## Cabinet The Fourth Lee Kuan Yew Cabinet consisted of the following members.
